title: Smash the Control Machine
text:
Smash the Control Machine is the fourth studio album from <a href="Otep">Otep</a>. It was released on August 18, 2009. A deluxe edition was released with a bonus DVD as well. The pre-release package also contained a T-shirt featuring the album cover and a poster of the cover. The album sold 10,400 copies in its first week of release to debut at #47 on The Billboard 200 chart. It was produced by <a href="Ulrich%20Wild">Ulrich Wild</a>, who worked with bands such as <a href="White%20Zombie%20%28band%29">White Zombie</a>, <a href="Static-X">Static-X</a>, <a href="Bleeding%20Through">Bleeding Through</a>, and <a href="Pantera">Pantera</a>. It is also the final album to feature long-time bassist Jason "eVil J" McGuire.
Track listing.
All music and lyrics written by <a href="Otep">Otep</a>.
Awards.
In 2010, Otep was nominated for a <a href="GLAAD%20Media%20Awards">GLAAD Media Award</a> for "Outstanding Music Artist" for the album "Smash the Control Machine" during the <a href="21st%20GLAAD%20Media%20Awards">21st GLAAD Media Awards</a>.
